name: Hungry Cat (KinGelaim, Little Prince)
description:
You play as a hungry cat in the forest. You need to catch mice. Avoid wool balls and owls!

Controls: mouse movement and left mouse button.

«The game was created while participating in the mini game jam 80 «Cats»

Limitation: 8x8 Textures


Programmer: @KinGelaim

Artist: @Little Prince

Audio: Free Assets
